sentences.english: The results can provide theoretical and technical support for hail monitoring and evaluation.
sentences.chinese: 研究結果可對雹災監測與評價提供理論與技術支持。

sentences.english: The high-frequency hail disaster area did not overlap with the high-frequency hail event area.
sentences.chinese: 但是雹災高峯區與冰雹發生高值區並不一致。
